segments.text: What's up , buddy ? You look so upset .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just broke up with a girl . Why didn't she understand that I loved her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . What's your conflict ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . She always said I didn't love her , but I did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you think about talking to her again ? Maybe she is waiting for your call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have asked for a talk again , but she refused and said she wanted to be quiet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , guy . Maybe she isn't your right person .
segments.speaker: S1
